title: Looking for 1869 P/S Cinci CDV - Ill put my whole collection on the table...
author: rainier2004

posts.post_title: Looking for 1869 P/S Cinci CDV - Ill put my whole collection on the table...
posts.post_content: Its a long shot but what the heck.  I am looking for this CDV, any condition and would be willing to trade anything I have for it including my Cracker Jacks, e107s or any other sets.  I have quite a few cards scanned into my profile on N54 if at all interested.  LMK if you have any thoughts of a deal, thanks for looking.

Is there a specific type you are looking for? Mine isn't for sale as it's the last 19th century card from my types...but it is one type of them.  It's in a SGC 50 holder...

[IMG]http://luckeycards.com/phunc1869peckandsnyderfinal2.JPG[/IMG]

I would have to give up all my CJs for yours Leon!   I always enjoy seeing it when you post.  I'd prefer the type like yours, but Im not really picky at this point as long as its the Cinci team...this card is the first bb card by my definition and where it all began!

[quote name="rainier2004" post=1257139]I would have to give up all my CJs for yours Leon!   I always enjoy seeing it when you post.  I'd prefer the type like yours, but Im not really picky at this point as long as its the Cinci team...this card is the first bb card by my definition and where it all began![/QUOTE]

They do come up for sale but not real often. A good hobby friend made me a great offer on this one but I just couldn't let it go. I happen to agree that it is where it all started, but it's debatable, I guess.
Also, not for sale, but the cdv type.
